name: Monkey Test Chamber
description:
Project developed for the Game Physics class, during the game development technologist course at Unisinos (2021/11).

The project is on hold and will likely not receive new updates.

There is a bug in the pause (audio) menu sliders, this only happens in the Launch version, so change your audio settings before starting the game.

Developed by: Erick Rafael Hasse de Oliveira

Github: https://github.com/bolo422/MonkeyTestChamber
